entry.title: A List Made of Functions
entry.content:
A list made of functions. Not a list containing functions, and not a function that creates lists. A list that is functions. That probably doesn’t make any sense, so let’s jump straight into the code…

``` python def make_node(value, next=None): def node(request):

if request == "value":
  return value
elif request == "next":
  return next

return node ```

Let’s try it out…

``` python numbers = make_node(1, make_node(2, make_node(3)))

numbers(“value”) # => 1 numbers(“next”)(“value”) # => 2 numbers(“next”)(“next”)(“value”) # => 3 ```
